title: News for September 2020
content:
[[=]]
**¬´ [[[news-08-2020|August 2020]]] | __[[[news-09-2020|September 2020]]]__ | [[[news-10-2020|October 2020]]] ¬ª**
[[/=]]

[[div style="border: 2px solid black; background-color: Moccasin;"]]
= The dynamic nature of this wiki means that linked pages might get moved, renamed, deleted, or replaced. Old news pages remain as time capsules and are not updated to account for these changes.
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]

#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#header {
    background-image: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news/SCPNewsLogo);
}

#header h2 span::before {
    color: #eee;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0f0c0;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #000;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
    content: 'Site Correspondence Periodical';
}
[[/module]]


[[size 75%]]This is a series showing off news from the site, articles from the past month[[footnote]] with a rating above 0 [[/footnote]], and fan-content for you to check out and discover! Be sure to leave a comment with your thoughts![[/size]]

++++* Fandom Stuff

* [https://www.gofundme.com/f/scp-legal-funds A hearing] in the SCP trademark case took place this month. Another court session was scheduled for next month.

* [http://fondationscp.wikidot.com/ SCP-FR] has a new domain - http://fondationscp.fr/ - that redirects visitors to the SCP-FR wiki.

* [http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/ SCP-DE]'s mentor system that helps newcomers to the site now has [http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/mentoren an information page].

* SCP-DE also accepted a large side canon - [http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/projekt-trickster Project Trickster] - into the official DE canon.

* [http://scp-es.com/ SCP-ES] is continuing its frequent micro-contests that take place on the forums. [http://scp-es.com/forum/t-13698749/de-regreso-a-las-andadas:reto-de-escritura The lastest one] was constrained to take place over the course of just five hours.

* The latest of [http://ko.scp-wiki.net/ SCP-KO]'s [http://ko.scp-wiki.net/bimonthly-contests-2020#toc4 bimonthly contests] concluded this month.


++++* Featured Articles

* [[[scp-4823| SCP-4823]]] ("The Whole World Has Gone Bananas") by Serabus _
Featured by Ocuin, Flopmind, and REDESERT _
> Following entry, SCP-4823 will unpeel itself.

* [http://www.scpwiki.com/remember "REMEMBER"] by Cerastes _
Featured by Truc Linh, Comrade Waldo, and Dr Sage Evergreen _
> Cain didn't have the luxury of forgetting why he did it...

* [http://scpwiki.com/a-song-that-is-unfortunately-about-toes "Single: untitled"] by oboebandgeek99 _
Featured by KaraKatt and Dr Gallium _
> While this is inspired by true things(ish) I've embellished the story.



++++* Reviewer's Spotlight Articles
[[[scp-5380| SCP-5380]]]: My World by chiifu featured by KaraKatt
[[[scp-5595| SCP-5595]]]: Geoffrey Quincy Harrison the Third: Site-Director, Gumball Machine  by PlaguePJPfeatured by redesert
[http://www.scpwiki.com/i-just-wanna-survive I Don't Wanna Be Special (I Just Wanna Survive)] by OboeBandGeek99
featured by Naveil
[[[scp-5335| SCP-5335]]]: The Freudian Split by MalyceGraves
Featured by Francis Scalia





[[f>toc]]

----

You will notice little 'üìà' emojis beside some articles. That denotes SCP articles which were under 30 and tales which were under 20 when this edition of site news was posted. Give them a little love! Speaking from personal experience, the most frustrating thing that can happen to an article is not deletion, but stagnating below 20 without any comments. So try to read, vote, and comment on these articles! They're often hidden gems :)

+++ Week of September 1st:


++++* SCPs
* üìà [[[scp-5516| SCP-5516]]] ("101 Lobster Friends") - Nothing more, nothing less. Account made by [[*user DodoDevil]].
* üìà [[[scp-3195| SCP-3195]]] ("The Fault in Our Star") - I knew that this star was a troublemaker. Of course, it's her fault. Of course. Written by [[*user Marcelles_Raynes]].
* üìà [[[scp-5705| SCP-5705]]] ("Powered by Thorium!‚Ñ¢") - Here's another material who can be a power source for you. COVID-19 can't stop us creating them. Made by [[*user Iszth]].
* [[[scp-5147| SCP-5147]]] ("The Mannequin Troupe") - This is not for your entertainment. Brought to you by [[*user Sirslash47]].
* [[[scp-5494| SCP-5494]]] ("The Lords of the Beneath World") - We still wait to know what exact beneath world they rule, they still have to come back to us. Investigations made by [[*user HarryBlank]].
* [[[scp-2754| SCP-2754]]] ("A Festival For One, a Festival For None.") - It's not the Fyre Festival II. Written by [[*user chiifu]].
* [[[scp-5346| SCP-5346]]] ("GUMP") - These GIMP bootlegs won't stop flooding us, am I right? Written by [[*user JakdragonX]].
* üìà [[[scp-pl-126| SCP-PL-126]]] ("The Union of Earth Socialist Republicans") - For a general union from all the earthlings against fascists of all natures and all dimensions! Manifesto written by [[*user Dr_Blackpeace]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[scp-5165| SCP-5165]]] ("A Ream of Paper") - This ream of paper don't want you to pay attention to them, everything is alright. Written by [[*user AdsidTFD]].
* [[[scp-314-j| SCP-314-J]]] ("Numerical Proofs (That You Suck)") - You are a lame-ass and here's the exact, objective reason why. Written by [[*user weizhong]].
* üìà [[[scp-5137| SCP-5137]]] ("Friendship Is Only Skin Deep") - Yeah, me and my friend, we made a joint tattoo on our backs for symbolize the bond that unites us. Pretty, isn't it? Written by [[*user Sebarus]].
* üìà [[[scp-cn-999| SCP-CN-999]]] ("//Spreading your wings//") - You're supposed to fly. Find your wings. Written by [[*user MScarlet]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[scp-5382| SCP-5382]]] ("The Cure, and What Ails You") - Tell us what is your level of pain and we will provide the most efficient Cure record for healing your injuries. Written by [[*user HarryBlank]].
* [[[scp-5143| SCP-5143]]] ("Heavy Fuel") - Powered by the SANDWICH. Written by [[*user daviiid]].

++++* Tales
* [[[looking-forward| Looking Forward]]] - "//What we have is a hostile force from outside our solar system with a significantly protracted history of interfering with human development.//" Written by [[*user Grigori Karpin]].
* üìà [[[cleaning-house| Cleaning House]]] - "//If you insist, I will kill you all. Is that what you want?//" Written by [[*user Grigori Karpin]].
* üìà [[[the-grand-delusion| The Grand Delusion]]] - "//You won't believe your eyes! Or your nose! Seriously, you might wanna cover your nose around some of these wonders.//" Written by [[*user Hellylessa]].
* üìà [[[a-lacking-response| A lacking response]]] - "//Those who discard them off the bat, maybe they're the real joke.//" Written by [[*user Wakawaaa]].


++++* GoI Formats

* [[[iron-priest-aic-fep26-pr4y5-m3k43| 'Iron-Priest.aic' (FEP26/PR4Y5/M3K43)]]] [Marshall, Carter & Dark, Ltd.] - "//So I've been talking to one of the Maxwellist higher-ups, and I've heard they are having problems with people losing their faith. So I made a deal with those Maxwellists, and they agreed to supply us with their tech, while we supply them with an AI of ours that can help them out with this little problem of theirs.//" Written by [[*user basirskipreader]].

++++* Misc
* [[[ananomalouswriter-s-wallpaper-place-and-more| AnAnomalousWriter's Wallpaper Place (and more)]]] - Wallpapers bring more life to your office, more colors and more joy, so don't hesitate to use it! [[*user AnAnomalousWriter]] have some in stock.
* [[[croq-workbench| Croquembouche's Workbench]]] - Croq' do his Mod things on this one. Written by [[*user Croquembouche]].
* [[[uau92020| Underread and Underrated September 2020]]] - Challenges are gud. Written by [[*user UraniumEmpire]].
@@ @@

+++ Week of September 8th:

++++* SCPs
* [[[scp-5842| SCP-5842]]] ("Sentient Stalking Stop Sign") - I'm particularly proud of this aliteration. Not too bad when it comes to a stalking sign. Written by [[*user Quadraginta]].
* [[[scp-5520| SCP-5520]]] ("The Rabbit Hole") - We all fell on it every day. We don't even know their exact number. [[*user HarryBlank]] fell on one, too.
* üìà [[[scp-5448| SCP-5448]]] ("When We Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?") - We go on a place with bad guys, when parties are never over and when people with strange addictions don't bury their friends. You should see them on crowns, tho. Written by [[*user Captain Kirby]].
* [[[scp-3946| SCP-3946]]] ("Amphitrite's Curse, Scylla's Wrath") - The saga of the big water hole and the big monster with many teeths continues. Written by [[*user Anorrack]].
* [[[scp-3743| SCP-3743]]] ("Euboea, Son of Briareos") - //Their Many Hands guide us in this life. We honor their creation with our blood and bodies. We are their many hands, shaping society in their image.// Written by [[*user Grigori Karpin]].
* [[[scp-5106| SCP-5106]]] ("Goosed") - Le Honk est grandiose. Written by [[*user DrAkimoto]].

++++* Tales
* üìà [[[acies| Acies]]] - "//when I am defeated by Mankind, when they inevitably win their final battle against their creator, I shall fall blind forevermore!//" Written by [[*user Tyumen]].
* üìà [[[the-blood-that-binds-us| The Blood That Binds Us]]] - "//Looks like it was a dead lead. Sorry for the trouble. Lets go folks,//" Written by [[*user Sebarus]].
* üìà [[[needs-of-the-many| Needs Of The Many]]] - "//There was science to be done. Lives to save.//" Written by [[*user ManyMeats]].

++++* GoI Formats

* [[[grant-request-for-mechacrocosquid| GRANT REQUEST FOR THE CYBERNETIC MODIFICATION OF THE CORPSE OF THE CROCOTEUTHIS GIGANTIS]]] [Prometheus Labs, Inc.] - "//One potential new eigenweapon class which will be able to terminate an LSA is known. In this, the relevance of the second deceased LSA becomes clear.//" Written by [[*user stormbreath]].
* [[[adoption-poster-cupid| Adoption Poster: Cupid!]]] [Wilson's Wildlife Solutions] - "//You told me I would be the perfect owner for Cupid because I know of nobody who wishes to meet me to do me harm. You were wrong.//" Written by [[*user Krombopulos_Will]].

++++* Misc
* [[[dr-john-peppersghost-pepper-s-personnel-file| Dr. John "PeppersGhost" Pepper's Personnel File]]] - It's [[*user PeppersGhost]]'s author page!
* [[[interviewing-icons-djkaktus| Interviewing Icons - djkaktus]]] - djkaktus as interviewed by [[*user WhiteGuard]].

@@ @@

+++ Week of September 15th:

++++* SCPs
* üìà [[[scp-99826-j| SCP-99826-J]]] ("The Mind Screw") - If you begin to feel your brain melting and escaping by your ears, don't panic. It's totally normal. Written by [[*user CuteFish]].
* üìà [[[scp-015-it| SCP-015-IT]]] ("Pipe Nightmare") - Don't ask Mario to go on an adventure inside of it. Even him cannot do that. Written by [[*user DrGraph]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[scp-spc-j| SCP-SPC-J]]] (""Shark" "Punching" "Center"") - Punch. Punch. Oscar. Punched by [[*user daveyoufool]].
* [[[scp-5265| SCP-5265]]] ("SKYFIRE") - It's beautiful when you see it by far. Not lighted by [[*user Popsioak]].
* [[[scp-5972| SCP-5972]]] ("Let All the Children Boogie") - He'd like to come and meet us but he thinks he'd blow our minds. Composed by [[*user ThisMightBeAuto]].
* üìà [[[scp-161-jp| SCP-161-JP]]] ("Eyling Inability") - Or whatever the word is. Written by [[*user undercat]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[scp-4291| SCP-4291]]] ("The Little Death") - It hurts less, I promise. Administered by [[*user Riemann]].


++++* Tales
* üìà [[[a-transfer-of-responsibility| A Transfer of Responsibility]]] - "//The legacy of fifty-seven years of Foundation research and the pride of one of the most meticulous researchers I had ever had the pleasure of working with was now in the capable hands of Wilson's Wildlife Solutions.//" Written by [[*user Dr John Silver]].
* üìà [[[panspermia| Panspermia]]] - "//I wonder what will come after us‚Ä¶//" Written by [[*user Dr_Moist]].
* [[[log-of-anomalous-items-vol-iii| Log Of Anomalous Items, Vol III]]] - Its Volume 3 of the Log of Anomalous Items! Written by [[*user Modulum]].
* [[[blind-to-the-big-surprise| Blind To The Big Surprise]]] - "//Percival Dark's smile dripped with venom.//" Written by [[*user ch00bakka]].
* üìà [[[a-fractured-curtain| A Fractured Curtain]]] - "//We can find you a replacement beanie! It‚Äôs easy! How about a magical one?‚Äù// Written by [[*user Hellylessa]].

++++* GoI Format
* [[[collected-item-no1080| Collected Item No. 1080]]] - It's Mr. Heavenly Virtues of the Misters Against Weed! Written by [[*user INT_Translator]].

++++* Misc
* [[[reality-s-very-real-probably-cognitohazardous-art-page| Reality's Very Real Probably Cognitohazardous Art Page]]] - Contrary to popular belief, this art is in fact very real and had not been created by cognitohazards. Made by [[*user IAmReal]].
* [[[groups-of-interest-jp| Groups Of Interest-JP]]] - The pals from Japan are in the place, people. Written by [[*user CheshireCheese]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[luxkeeper-s-artpage| Luxkeeper's Artpage]]] - It's important to update your logos in a consistent way. It's the job of [[*user Luxkeeper]].
* [[[honeychips4090| Honey's art page]]] - MOAR PIXEL. Made by [[*user HoneyChips4090]].
* [[[interviewing-icons-hub| Interviewing Icons Hub]]] - [[*user WhiteGuard]], the half-official interviewer of the site, is not done with interviews of famous authors. Who wants more?
* [[[interviewing-icons-rounderhouse| Interviewing Icons - Rounderhouse]]] - Rounderhouse as interviewed by [[*user WhiteGuard]].

+++ Week of September 22nd:

++++* SCPs

* [[[scp-5070| SCP-5070]]] ("Oh, for the love of God.") - me IRL. Written by [[*user HunterDog]].
* [[[scp-5194| SCP-5194]]] ("Resurfaced Memortics") - Not memetics, tho. It's an other beast. Written by [[*user DodoDevil]].
* üìà  [[[scp-4584| SCP-4584]]] ("cold dreams.") - As coldest as the winter Kanye sung about, one day. Freezed by [[*user chiifu]].
* üìà [[[scp-1020-j| SCP-1020-J]]] ("Fridge Horror") - Expired food is more horrifying than anything you could ever dream. Written by [[*user Roget]].
* üìà [[[scp-5896| SCP-5896]]] ("Windows 95 for Elders") - It's never too late for learning how the Internet works! If you follow the instructions of this book made by [[*user Edna Granbo]], you will know everything about that!


++++* Tales
* üìà [[[that-divine-strife| Remember Me as a Time of Day]]] - "//Your generation's new-fangled slang is always amiss, bhaiji//" Written by [[*user Popsioak]].
* [[[strange-beasts| Strange Beasts]]] - "//You can learn a lot about yourself from the stories you seek out. Sometimes even things you didn't know were true.//" Written by [[*user daviiid]].

++++* Misc
* [[[canon-jp-2| evilFoundation - Secure. Contain. Predominate.]]] - Ethics and protection of humanity? Bitch, please, it's so outdated. Written by [[*user tokage-otoko]], translated by [[*user INT_Translator]].
* [[[top-rated-jokes| Top Rated Joke Articles]]] - These articles will totally give you a good laugh, because numbers never lie. Written by [[*user Croquembouche]].
* [[[top-rated-goi-formats| Top Rated Group of Interest Formats]]] - Few people know how the Groups of Interest write about things that happened to us. This time is close to an end. Written by [[*user Croquembouche]].

+++ Canon Renaissance Contest Entries

[[module ListPages separate="no" tags="+canon2020 -hub " perPage="100" order="random"]]
* [[size 120%]]**%%title_linked%%**[[/size]] [[size 105%]]//by// **%%created_by%%**[[/size]]
[[/module]]


+++ Fanart

[[module css]]
/*
This tooltip hover effect is adapted from LurkD's code on http://www.scp-wiki.net/command-query-separation
*/
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span {display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: -15px;
    height: auto;
    max-width: 27%;
    background: rgba(230, 230, 230, 1);
    border-style: double;
    border-color: #fff;
    border-width: thick;
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 1em;
    border-radius: 15px 15px 0px;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]

+++++* Here you will find a selection of artists whose art output is worth following. The thumbnails are clickable.

----
+* Q&A:

++* Q: Can I replace a blurb that you wrote for one of my articles with my own? I'm not satisfied with it.

A: Absolutely. You will always have that option at any point.

++* Q: I noticed an error/typo/incorrect information and wish to correct it. May I?

A: Sure! If the changes are not limited to your own article(s) and/or are substantial changes across multiple entries, you should post in that month's discussion page and then make the changes.

++* Q: I wrote an article and it seems to have stuck. Can I send a blurb of mine to one of the frequent collaborators?

A: Yup! It's much easier if you come to us about it, and it gives you the control over what you want shown on the news page.
